segment.source: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) offers a customized control panel for MBAM client computers that is named called BitLocker Encryption Options.
segment.target: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) offers a customized control panel for MBAM client computers that is named called BitLocker Encryption Options.

segment.source: This customized control panel can replace the default Windows BitLocker control panel that is named BitLocker Drive Encryption.
segment.target: This customized control panel can replace the default Windows BitLocker control panel that is named BitLocker Drive Encryption.

segment.source: The BitLocker Encryption Options control panel, located under System and Security in the Windows control panel, enables users to manage their PIN and passwords, unlock drives, and hides the interface that allows administrators to decrypt a drive or to suspend or resume BitLocker encryption.
segment.target: The BitLocker Encryption Options control panel, located under System and Security in the Windows control panel, enables users to manage their PIN and passwords, unlock drives, and hides the interface that allows administrators to decrypt a drive or to suspend or resume BitLocker encryption.

segment.source: To hide default BitLocker Encryption in the Windows Control Panel
segment.target: To hide default BitLocker Encryption in the Windows Control Panel

segment.source: Browse to User configuration by using the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC), the Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM), or the Local Group Policy Editor on the BitLocker Group Policies computer.
segment.target: Browse to User configuration by using the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC), the Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM), or the Local Group Policy Editor on the BitLocker Group Policies computer.

segment.source: Click Policies, select Administrative Templates, and then click Control Panel.
segment.target: Click Policies, select Administrative Templates, and then click Control Panel.

segment.source: In the Details pane, double-click Hide specified Control Panel items, and then select Enabled.
segment.target: In the Details pane, double-click Hide specified Control Panel items, and then select Enabled.

segment.source: Click Show, click Add…, and then type Microsoft.BitLockerDriveEncryption.
segment.target: Click Show, click Add…, and then type Microsoft.BitLockerDriveEncryption.

segment.source: This policy hides the default Windows BitLocker Management tool from the Windows Control Panel and allows the user to open the updated MBAM BitLocker Encryption Options tool from the Windows Control Panel.
segment.target: This policy hides the default Windows BitLocker Management tool from the Windows Control Panel and allows the user to open the updated MBAM BitLocker Encryption Options tool from the Windows Control Panel.
